org.lightningj.paywall.spring.local

Class LocalProfileBeanConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.spring.CommonBeanConfiguration
      • org.lightningj.paywall.spring.local.BaseLocalProfileBeanConfiguration
        • org.lightningj.paywall.spring.local.LocalProfileBeanConfiguration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomLocalProfileBeanConfiguration

    @Configuration
 @Profile(value="paywall_local")
 @Conditional(value=DefaultLocalBeanCondition.class)
public class LocalProfileBeanConfiguration
extends BaseLocalProfileBeanConfiguration
    Default Spring Bean Configuration for running paywall in local mode. This configuration can be overrriden by specifying own Configuration and setting property 'paywall.custombeans.enable=true'
